message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
You started high, I'll try to drive a harder bargain!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a fair share!
I'm not getting any younger, let's wrap this up!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about settling!
I'm getting closer to your offer, Bob. Let's meet in the middle!
